title: Road Toads of Cane River
description: Jason loves Veronica Rachal. His ravishing soon-to-be-girlfriend.Jason loves Loach Delphin. The Immortal Instar.Jason doesn’t love Loo Jack. A crusty Raven with weaponized projectile trots.A diabolical arch-enemy kidnaps Loach Delphin, who must be rescued at all costs. Jason and his fellow Road Toads flee bucolic Cane Riverton and embark on a perilous journey to Mazar and the tyrannical despot Blastocyst. Clouded by Veronica’s stormy passion, bound by a blood covenant with Loach Delphin, Jason bravely guides the Road Toads through rousing adventure and harrowing escapes. An unholy alliance of supernatural forces and bitter treachery eventually thrust the Cane Riverton Creoles into a desperate battle for survival.
author: R. Steven Page
